name: Oneiro Provato
description:
*fullscreen recommended*

**remember to click on the game once you push run**

Explore a wacky world full of weird and wonderful sheep in this tiny metroidvania(if you can even call it that haha)!

- Controls - 

< and > to move

^ to jump

z to do thing that you'll learn eventually ;)

Made in a week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
